member.name: T:Endeca.Navigation.AccessControl.ILoginModule
member.summary: LoginModule Interface - implemented by authentication and authorization providers.

member.name: M:Endeca.Navigation.AccessControl.ILoginModule.Login
member.summary: Perform initial authentication. Save authorization information until Commit or Abort.

members.member: Logout the user. Remove all credntial information and remove authorization information

member.name: T:Endeca.Navigation.AccessControl.IAuthCredentialRequest
member.summary: Base interface for authentication information requests.

member.name: T:Endeca.Navigation.AccessControl.SimpleCredentialRequest
member.summary: The base class of credential requests that are settable with a String value. All credential requests that are to be used from the string array constructor should extend this class.

member.name: T:Endeca.Navigation.AccessControl.PasswordRequest
member.summary: A simple password credential requestor. This may be used with the string array constructor.

members.member: A simple user credential requestor. This may be used with the LoginManager.Login(String[], String[]) method.

member.name: T:Endeca.Navigation.AccessControl.IAuthCredentialRequestHandler
member.summary: Interface implemented by clients of the ILoginManager interface to provide authentication credentials

members.member: Requests that the handler service the given requests. Throws an UnsupportedCredentialException if the request could not be serviced by the handler, or other exception if an error occurs.

member.name: T:Endeca.Navigation.AccessControl.StaticCredentialRequestHandler
member.summary: A simple request handler that uses a username and password

members.member: Exception thrown by an IAuthCredentialRequestHandler when an unknown credential request is encountered.
The base type of exceptions thrown by the LoginModules when authentication fails.
The base type of exceptions thrown by the LoginManager

member.name: T:Endeca.Navigation.AccessControl.StaticCredReq
member.summary: Internal only class used to convert String credential arrays into a request handler.
